You must be brave or stupid to think you might loot my treasure and live. Either way, I applaud you!
Proceed, exile, and seize what you can, while you can.
The corruption is growing. Hurry now, before it consumes you as it did me.
Bah! You are unworthy to bear my legacy. Feed the corruption with your corpse.
The Nightmare has your scent. Now it hungers for your flesh.
Is your cup half empty or half full, exile?
Disappointing. It seems corruption will get the better of you after all.
The room grows still and quiet...
